name: WaniKani Forums: Transparent Theme
description:
A transparent theme for the Wanikani forums made for use with custom backgrounds. If you have any comments or questions you can reach me by posting on the forums.
[Userstyle] Transparent theme for forums

Intended to be used with the Lesson/Review Count in Forums script by rfindley but works well without it too.
[Userscript] Lesson/Review Count in Forums
css:
@-moz-document domain(community.wanikani.com) {

/*___________________________________________________*/
/*                      GLOBAL                       */
/*___________________________________________________*/

body {
    /* BACKGROUND IMAGE LINK */
    background: #92869a url(https://i.imgur.com/JplJ4pL.jpg); 
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    background-attachment: fixed;}

#main {
    padding-top: 10px;}

.private-message_warning,
footer#page-footer {
    display: none !important;}


/*___________________________________________________*/
/*                        TEXT                       */
/*___________________________________________________*/

/* Primary colour and its nuances */
#next_review,
#reply-control .d-editor-button-bar,
#reply-control .d-editor-preview .poll li[data-poll-option-id],
#reply-control.draft .row,
#reply-control .reply-to,
#reply-control .reply-to a,
#reply-control .wmd-controls .d-editor-input,
#reply-control .wmd-controls .d-editor-preview,
#review_count,
#share-link h3,
#suggested-topics h3 a,
#user-card .card-content a,
.about-page .about,
.about .details,
.about .secondary,
.badge-notification.new-posts,
.badge-notification.unread-posts,
.badges-page,
.badges-page .container.badges .title,
.cakeday .anniversaries,
.cakeday .birthdays,
.category-description,
.category-list .subcategories .badge-notification.new-posts,
.category-list .topics .badge-notification,
.category-list .topics div,
.category-list th,
.custom-body,
.categories-and-latest .topic-last-activity a,
.extra-info-wrapper .topic-link,
.fps-result .like-count,
.hamburger-panel .category-links .category-link a,
.hljs-comment,
.list-controls .category-breadcrumb li.bullet
.navigation-topics .list-container #list-area .topic-list-bottom .education,
.not-found-container a,
.notification-options .dropdown-menu span.title,
.onebox .badge-notification,
.onebox .onebox-body,
.page-not-found,
.page-not-found-topics,
.post-controls .show-replies,
.post-links-container .post-links .badge-notification,
.primary-textual h3 a,
.quote-controls .back:before,
.saved-user,
.search-container .fps-result,
.search-container .fps-result .blurb .date,
.search-container .fps-result .topic-title span,
.search-container .search-title,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options,
.select2-drop,
.show-badge .grant-info-item,
.show-badge a,
.small-action-desc .custom-message,
.static-faq div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'],
.static-privacy div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'],
.static-tos div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'],
.latest-topic-list .table-heading,
.latest-topic-list-item .main-link a.title,
.topic-body .badge-notification.clicks,
.topic-body .contents .cooked,
.topic-body .cooked,
.topic-body .poll,
.topic-body .poll .poll-info,
.topic-body .poll .results .percentage,
.topic-body .relative-date,
.topic-list .num a.badge-posts,
.topic-list .topic-stats div,
.topic-list a.title,
.topic-list th,
.topic-map .topic-links .badge-notification.clicks,
.topic-map .topic-links a,
.topic-map h3,
.timeline-container .post-excerpt,
.unread-notifications,
.user-menu .notifications li span,
.user-preferences .apps .controls div span,
.user-table .child-actions,
.user-table .no-content,
.user-table .top-section .value,
.user-table .top-sub-section ul li span,
.user-table .user-preferences .static,
.user-table .user-preferences label,
.user-table .user-stream .item .relative-date,
.user-table .user-stream .item p,
div.menu-links-header a,
div.menu-links-header a,
h3.stats-title,
p,
span#lesson_count.dashboard_bubble,
span.post-count,
.names span a,
ul {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

#reply-control .d-editor-preview .onebox a,
#suggested-topics .topic-list-item .num,
#suggested-topics .topic-list-item .posts-map,
#user-card .card-content .metadata h3 .desc,
.about .secondary dl dt,
.action-list .active,
.alert.alert-info,
.autocomplete a span,
.autocomplete a span.badge-wrapper.bullet span.badge-category,
.badge-posts[href],
.badge-card .badge-contents .badge-info h3 a,
.btn,
.btn-primary.disabled,
.btn-primary[disabled],
.btn[disabled],
.cakeday .anniversaries .user-info .user-detail a,
.cakeday .birthdays .user-info .user-detail a,
.control-label,
.d-editor-preview .spoiled:hover,
.info .title a,
.list-controls .category-breadcrumb li.bullet > .badge-category,
.menu-panel a,
.nav-pills > li.active > a,
.nav-pills > li > a,
.onebox a,
.onebox .onebox-body .filesize,
.pinned-options .dropdown-menu .title,
.post-controls .actions .widget-button,
.post-controls .show-replies:hover,
.post-controls div button:hover,
.search-menu li:not(.category):not(.heading) a .user-results,
.select2-drop .select2-results .badge-wrapper .badge-category,
.top-lists .period-popup a,
.topic-body .cooked .spoiled:hover,
.topic-list .num a:not(.badge-posts),
.topic-list-item a.title,
.topic-list .num,
.topic-list .number,
.topic-list .topic-stats .num .posts-map,
.topic-map .map .number, .topic-map .map i,
.timeline-container .post-excerpt .username,
.user-activity-page .user-table .user-right span.relative-date,
.user-info .user-detail .username a,
.user-table .badges-section .badge-info a,
.user-table .links-section ul li a,
.wanikani-app-nav li,
.wanikani-app-nav li a,
.website-name a,
.widget-button.reply,
div[itemprop="mainContentOfPage"] h2 a,
nav.post-controls .highlight-action,
.topic-body .topic-meta-data .reply-to-tab span,
li[data-highlight="false"] span#next_review.dashboard_bubble,
.who-liked {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.topic-list-bottom h3 a,
.topic-post .user-title .user-group {
    color: rgb(220,220,220);}

#topic-title .badge-wrapper .badge-category {
    color: rgb(220,220,220) !important;}

#draft-status,
#file-uploading,
#reply-control .toggler,
#reply-control a.cancel,
#reply-control a.toggle-preview,
#share-link .reply-as-new-topic a,
#share-link .social-link a,
#topic-progress,
#user-card .card-content,
#user-card .card-content .metadata h3 .relative-date,
.badge-card .grant-count,
.cakeday .anniversaries .user-info,
.cakeday .anniversaries .user-info .user-detail .title,
.cakeday .birthdays .user-info,
.cakeday .birthdays .user-info .user-detail .title,
.cakeday .user-info-empty-message h4,
.d-header .contents .search-context,
.latest-topic-list-item .main-link a.title.visited:not(.badge-notification),
.notification-options .dropdown-menu span.desc,
.period-chooser .top-date-string,
.pinned-options .dropdown-menu span,
.quote-controls,
.quote-controls .quote-other-topic:before,
.search-container .fps-result .ember-view,
.search-menu .no-results,
.top-lists .period-popup .top-date-string,
.topic-list a.title.visited:not(.badge-notification),
.topic-map .information,
.topic-map .link-summary a,
.topic-map .map ul li h4,
.topic-map .participants .user a,
.topic-map span.domain,
.topic-map .topic-links .domain
.user-info .user-detail .title,
.user-menu .notifications .read a div,
.user-preferences .apps .controls div,
.user-table .badges-section p a,
.user-table .links-section .domain,
.user-table .top-section .label,
.user-table .top-section .likes-section .user-detail .number,
.user-table .top-sub-section a,
.user-table .top-sub-section ul li a,
.user-table .user-preferences .instructions {
    color: rgb(200,200,200);}

.timeline-container .post-excerpt a,
#reply-control .d-editor-preview a,
.about .details .bio,
.about .secondary dl dd,
.action-list li a,
.badge-card .badge-summary,
.extra-info-wrapper .badge-wrapper.bullet span.badge-category,
.hamburger-panel .category-links .category-link .badge-wrapper .badge-category,
.list-controls .category-dropdown-menu .cat .badge-wrapper .badge-category,
.list-controls .category-dropdown-menu .cat a,
.menu-panel .bullet span.badge-category,
.panel-body .results .widget-link .badge-wrapper .badge-category,
.select2-drop .select2-results li div,
.select2-drop .select2-results li span ,
.show-badge .user-info .granted-on,
.topic-map .information .widget-button,
.topic-list-item a.title.visited,
.user-table .user-right .badge-wrapper span.badge-category {
    color: rgb(200,200,200) !important;}



/* Secondary colour and nuances */
#keyboard-shortcuts-help li,
#suggested-topics h3,
#topic-title h1 a,
.badge-notification.new-topic,
.cakeday .anniversaries .cakeday-months .select2-container a,
.cakeday .birthdays .cakeday-months .select2-container a,
.gap,
.modal-body,
.modal-inner-container,
.modal-inner-container .close,
.modal-inner-container .radio,
.navigation-topics .list-container #list-area .topic-list-bottom .education a,
.post-links-container .post-links .track-link,
.quote .quote .quote p,
.search-container .fps-result .search-highlight,
.search-container .search-title .select2-choice,
.search-container .search-title .select2-chosen,
.search-container .search-title .select2-chosen-1,
.search-container .search-title .select2-container,
.search-container .search .full-page-search,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .ac-wrap,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-choice,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-chosen,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-chosen-2,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-container,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options input,
.show-badge h1,
.small-action-desc .custom-message a,
.static-faq div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'] a,
.static-privacy div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'] a,
.static-tos div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'] a,
.top-lists h2,
.topic-body .poll .results,
.topic-body .topic-meta-data .reply-to-tab span,
.topic-body a,
.topic-list-bottom h3,
.topic-list .topic-list-item-separator td span,
.topic-post-badges .badge-notification.unread,
.topic-status-info,
.user-preferences .controls a,
.user-table .top-section,
.user-table .top-sub-section,
.user-table .user-content .control-group .select2-container a,
.user-table .user-content .control-group:first-child,
.user-table .user-preferences .control-label,
.user-table .user-preferences input,
.user-table .user-right .mention,
.user-table .user-stream .title,
.user-table .user-stream a,
aside.quote .title,
#revisions ul {
    color: rgb(42,42,42);}

a,
a:hover,
a:visited {
    color: #2A2A2A;}


#user-card .card-content li .btn,
#user-card.show-badges .badge-section .more-user-badges,
#user-card.show-badges .badge-section .user-badge,
.badge-wrapper.bullet span.badge-category,
.category-list a.badge-wrapper.bullet span.badge-category,
.modal-body #display-modes .btn,
.modal-inner-container .modal-body label,
.small-action-desc p,
.small-action .small-action-desc,
.topic-body .post-info.edits a,
.user-table .badge-notification span {
    color: rgb(42,42,42) !important;}

.category-controls .bullet .badge-category.restricted {
    color: rgb(84,84,84) !important;}

.topic-body a.mention,
.badge-card .badge-contents .badge-info {
    color: rgb(68,68,68);}

#reply-control .d-editor-preview a.mention,
.onebox .onebox-body h3 a {
    color: rgb(68,68,68) !important;}


/*___________________________________________________*/
/*                        FAS                        */
/*___________________________________________________*/

/* UNIMPORTANT */
.embedded-posts .arrow,
.latest-topic-list .d-icon-bookmark,
.main-nav.nav.nav-pills.user-nav.ember-view .fa-certificate,
.main-nav.nav.nav-pills.user-nav.ember-view .fa-cog,
.main-nav.nav.nav-pills.user-nav.ember-view .fa-comment,
.main-nav.nav.nav-pills.user-nav.ember-view .fa-envelope-o,
.notification-options .dropdown-menu .fa,
.poll-buttons .fa,
.private-message-glyph .fa-envelope,
.user-preferences .fa-dot-circle-o,
.user-preferences .fa-times-circle,
.user-preferences .muting .fa-times-circle,
.user-table .user-right .fa-times,
div.menu-links-header .fa {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

#share-link .fa-close,
.notification-options .dropdown-menu .fa-circle-o {
    color: rgb(200,200,200);}

.timeline-scrollarea .fa-minus {
    display: none;}

.btn-pridmary.create .fa-reply {
    opacity: 0.7;}


/* DARK */
.fa-lock,
.topic-avatar .fa {
    color: rgb(42,42,42);}

.topic-avatar .fa-plus-circle {
    color: rgb(42,42,42) !important;}

/* 240 */
#suggested-topics .fa-bookmark,
#topic-title .fa-pencil,
.fa-bars,
.fa-chevron-down,
.fa-search,
.fa-thumb-tack,
.location-and-website .fa,
.notifications ul li a .fa,
.post-controls .actions .widget-button .fa,
.topic-body .fa-ellipsis-h,
.topic-body .fa-link,
.topic-list .topic-status .fa-bookmark,
.user-table .user-right .fa-bookmark,
.user-table .user-right .item.notification .fa {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}


/* 200 */
#cancel-file-upload .fa-times,
#reply-control .draft-text .fa-mail-forward,
#reply-control .fa-mail-forward,
#topic-footer-buttons .fa-reply,
.autocomplete .fa-lock,
.extra-info-wrapper .badge-wrapper .fa-lock,
.list-controls .category-dropdown-menu .cat .fa-lock,
.notification-options .dropdown-menu .fa-times-circle.muted,
.notifications ul li a .fa.fa-pencil,
.panel-body .fa-lock,
.pinned-options .fa-thumb-tack,
.post-controls .actions .fa,
.post-links-container .post-links .fa-link,
.topic-post .fa-mail-forward,
.user-table .user-right .item.notification .fa.fa-pencil {
    color: rgb(200,200,200) !important;}


/* COLOR */
.bookmarked .fa-bookmark,
.fps-result .like-count .fa-heart,
.fa.tracking, 
.fa.watching,
.notification-options .dropdown-menu .fa-circle,
.notification-options .dropdown-menu .fa-exclamation-circle,
.notification-options .dropdown-menu .fa-times-circle,
.notifications ul li a .fa.fa-heart,
.read-icon.bookmarked:before,
.timeline-container .topic-timeline .btn .fa-circle,
.timeline-container .topic-timeline .btn .fa-exclamation-circle,
.topic-area .widget-button .fa-circle,
.topic-area .widget-button .fa-exclamation-circle,
.topic-post .read-state .fa-circle,
.user-preferences .fa-circle,
.user-preferences .fa-exclamation-circle,
.user-table .user-right .item.notification .fa.fa-heart,
.user-table i.fa-heart,
.widget-button.has-like .fa.fa-heart {
    color: #C26FDC !important;}

.notifications ul li a .fa.fa-at,
.user-table .user-right .item.notification .fa.fa-at {
    color: rgb(88, 162, 228) !important;}

.remove .fa-times,
.notifications ul li a .fa.fa-reply,
.user-table .user-right .item.notification .fa.fa-reply {
    color: rgb(239, 103, 103) !important;}

.fa.accepted,
.post-controls .accepted .fa.fa-check-square,
.topic-status .fa.fa-check-square-o,
.notifications .fa.fa-check-square,
.stats-section .fa.fa-check-square,
.user-activity-bottom-outlet.solved-list .fa.fa-check-square {
    color: rgb(187, 241, 165) !important;}


/*___________________________________________________*/
/*                   TRANSPARENCY                    */
/*___________________________________________________*/

/* 0.1 */
.topic-list,
.list-container {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1);}

.show-badge,
.show-badge .user-info,
.about-page .about .user-info,
.topic-list thead tr .sortable:hover,
.topic-list thead tr .activity.sortable:hover {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important;}

.badge-card .badge-icon {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.15) !important;}


/* 0.2 */
.about-page .about,
.badges-page .container.badges,
.cakeday .anniversaries,
.cakeday .anniversaries .user-info,
.cakeday .birthdays,
.cakeday .birthdays .user-info,
.categories-and-latest .topic-list .more-topics td,
.page-not-found,
.page-not-found-topics,
.post-controls .show-replies:hover,
.post-controls div button:hover,
.search-container .fps-result,
.search-container .search,
.search-container .search-title,
.static-faq div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'],
.static-privacy div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'],
.static-tos div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'],
.topic-map .buttons .btn,
.topic-post,
.user-right.messages .topic-list,
.user-table .top-section,
.user-table .top-sub-section ul li,
.user-table .user-content,
.user-table .user-stream .item,
div[itemprop="mainContentOfPage"],
nav.post-controls .show-replies:hover,
nav.post-controls button.like.d-hover,
nav.post-controls button.d-hover {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.2);}

.edit-reason {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important;}


/* 0.3 */
.topic-map,
.user-table .user-preferences .control-group {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);}

.badge-card,
.badge-contents,
.user-table .user-badges-list {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.3) !important;}


/* 0.4 */
.topic-map .buttons .btn:hover,
.user-main .user-stream .notification.unread {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4);}


/* 0.5 */
.btn:active {
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);}

.about .details,
.about .secondary,
a.btn-reply-here {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;}


/* 0.6 */
/* 0.7 */
.btn:hover,
.nav-pills > li > a:hover,
.list-controls .category-breadcrumb li.bullet:hover {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7);}

.timeline-fullscreen,
#reply-control,
#share-link,
#topic-progress,
#user-card .card-content,
.action-list,
.autocomplete,
.custom-body,
.d-header,
.list-controls .category-dropdown-menu,
.menu-panel,
.select-box-collection,
.notification-options .dropdown-menu,
.pinned-options .dropdown-menu,
.select2-drop,
.top-lists .period-popup {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7) !important;}


/* 0.8 */
/* 0.9 */


/*___________________________________________________*/
/*                   Border-radius                   */
/*___________________________________________________*/

/* 10px */
#user-card.show-badges .badge-section .more-user-badges,
#user-card.show-badges .badge-section .user-badge,
.about,
.about-page .about,
.about-page .about .user-info,
.action-list,
.badges-page .container.badges,
.cakeday .anniversaries,
.cakeday .anniversaries .user-info,
.cakeday .birthdays,
.cakeday .birthdays .user-info,
.drop-down-visible .d-header .icons .active .icon,
.header-dropdown-toggle a:hover,
.list-container,
.onebox,
.page-not-found,
.page-not-found-topics,
.pinned-options .dropdown-menu,
.post-controls .show-replies:hover,
.post-controls div button:hover,
.search-container .fps-result,
.search-container .search,
.show-badge,
.show-badge .user-info,
.static-faq div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'],
.static-privacy div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'],
.static-tos div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'],
.top-lists .period-popup ul li:hover,
.topic-body .poll,
.topic-list,
.topic-map,
.topic-post,
.user-preferences .ac-wrap,
.user-table .top-section,
.user-table .user-badges-list,
.user-table .user-content,
.user-table .user-preferences,
.user-table .user-preferences .control-group,
.user-table .user-stream .item,
nav.post-controls button.d-hover,
div.menu-links-header a:hover,
div[itemprop="mainContentOfPage"] {
    border-radius: 10px;}

#reply-control .control-row,
#reply-control.draft .row,
.badge-card,
.badge-contents,
.edit-reason,
.search-container .search-title .select2-choice,
.search-container .search-title .select2-chosen,
.search-container .search-title .select2-chosen-1,
.search-container .search-title .select2-container,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .ac-wrap,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-choice,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-chosen,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-chosen-2,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-container,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options input,
.topic-list .topic-list-item-separator td span,
.user-table .badge-card,
.user-table .badge-contents
.user-table .user-badges-list .badge-card,
.user-table .user-badges-list .badge-contents {
    border-radius: 5px;}

.d-editor-preview .spoiled,
.topic-body .cooked .spoiled {
    border-radius: 5px !important;}

.about-page .about h2,
.about-page .about h3,
.about-page .about h4,
.badges-page .container.badges .title,
.btn,
.cakeday .anniversaries h3,
.cakeday .birthdays h3,
.highlight-strong,
.list-controls .category-breadcrumb li.bullet,
.nav-pills > li.active > a,
.nav-pills > li > a,
.static-faq div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'] h2,
.static-tos div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'] h2,
.user-table .user-content .control-group:first-child,
.user-table .user-preferences .control-label,
.user-table .user-stream .title {
    border-radius: 4px;}

.topic-body .highlighted {
    border-radius: 3px;}

.menu-panel ul.menu-links li a:hover,
.menu-panel ul li.heading a:hover{
    border-radius: 0px;}

#topic-progress,
.no-background .details,
.search-container .search-title,
.alert.alert-info {
    border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0;}

.navigation-topics .list-container #list-area .contents .topic-list {
    border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0 !important;}

.topic-map .buttons .btn,
.topic-list thead tr .activity.sortable:hover {
    border-radius: 0 10px 0 0;}

.d-header .contents {
    border-radius: 10px 10px 3px 3px;}

.topic-list .more-topics td {
    border-radius: 0 0 0 10px;}

.user-table .badges-section .badge-icon,
.user-table .user-badges-list .badge-card .badge-icon,
.badge-card .badge-icon {
    border-radius: 5px 0 0 5px;}


/*___________________________________________________*/
/*                 Common backgrounds                */
/*___________________________________________________*/

.alert.alert-info,
.btn,
.list-controls .category-breadcrumb li.bullet,
.nav-pills > li.active > a,
.nav-pills > li > a,
.post-links-container .post-links .badge-notification,
.topic-map .topic-links .badge-notification.clicks {
    background-color: rgb(42,42,42);}

#reply-control .category-input .select2-container,
#reply-control .title-input input,
#user-card .card-content li .btn,
#user-card.show-badges .badge-section .more-user-badges,
#user-card.show-badges .badge-section .user-badge,
.cakeday .anniversaries .cakeday-months .select2-container,
.cakeday .birthdays .cakeday-months .select2-container,
.search-container .search-title .select2-choice,
.search-container .search-title .select2-chosen,
.search-container .search-title .select2-chosen-1,
.search-container .search-title .select2-container,
.search-container .search .full-page-search,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .ac-wrap,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-choice,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-chosen,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-chosen-2,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-container,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options input,
.timeline-container .topic-timeline .timeline-handle,
.topic-body .poll .results .bar-back,
.topic-body a.mention,
.topic-list .topic-list-item-separator td span,
.user-preferences .ac-wrap,
.user-table .badges-section .badge-icon,
.user-table .user-badges-list .badge-card,
.user-table .user-badges-list .badge-contents,
.user-table .user-content .control-group .select2-container,
.user-table .user-preferences .control-group .select2-container,
.user-table .user-right .mention,
html {
    background-color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.topic-body .badge-notification.clicks,
.topic-body .poll .results .bar,
.onebox .badge-notification,
.badge-notification.new-posts, 
.badge-notification.unread-posts,
.modal.history-modal #revision-controls .btn[disabled] {
    background-color: #545454;}

.btn-primary[disabled], 
.btn-primary.disabled, 
.btn[disabled] {
    background-color: rgb(84,84,84) !important;}

#reply-control .category-input .select2-container a.select2-choice,
#reply-control .submit-panel .btn,
#topic-progress .bg,
.select2-drop .select2-no-results,
.user-menu .notifications .read,
.user-menu .notifications .read.last.heading:hover,
.user-table .alert {
    background-color: transparent;}

#review_count,
#next_review,
span#lesson_count.dashboard_bubble,
.topic-body .poll .results .chosen .bar,
.badge-card .check-display.status-checked {
    background-color: #C26FDC;}


.unread-notifications,
li[data-highlight="false"] span#next_review.dashboard_bubble,
.d-header header-dropdown-toggle.current-user.active .badge-notification,
.d-header .icons .badge-notification {
    background-color: #C26FDC !important;}

#reply-control .control-row,
#reply-control.draft .row,
.about-page .about h2,
.about-page .about h3,
.about-page .about h4,
.badges-page .container.badges .title,
.cakeday .anniversaries h3,
.cakeday .birthdays h3,
.d-header .contents,
.static-faq div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'] h2,
.static-tos div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'] h2,
.user-menu .notifications li,
.user-table .user-content .control-group:first-child,
.user-table .user-preferences .control-label {
    background-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.2);}

.menu-panel ul.menu-links li a:hover,
.menu-panel ul li.heading a:hover,
div.menu-links-header a:hover,
.user-menu .notifications li:hover {
    background-color: rgba(200,200,200,0.3);}

.user-table .user-stream .title,
.select2-drop .select2-results li:hover,
.select2-drop .select2-results .select2-highlighted,
.topic-body .poll,
.topic-body .highlighted {
    background-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.3);}

.d-editor-preview .spoiled,
.topic-body .cooked .spoiled,
aside.quote .title, 
blockquote, 
body code {
    background-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.3) !important;}

#reply-control .d-editor,

.cakeday .birthdays .cakeday-months .select2-container a,

.list-controls .category-dropdown-menu,
.pinned-options .dropdown-menu,
.post-stream div,
.search-container .search-title .select2-choice,
.search-container .search-title .select2-chosen,

.search-container .search-title .select2-container,
.search-container .search .full-page-search,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options,

.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-choice,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-chosen,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-chosen-2,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-container,

#topic-progress,

/*___________________________________________________*/
/*                Page Specific Styles               */
/*___________________________________________________*/

/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~HEADER~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/

#site-logo {
    margin-top: -3px;}

.unread-private-messages {
    color: rgb(255,255,255);
    background: rgb(84,84,84) !important;}

.d-header .contents {
    padding-right: 15px;
    padding-left: 15px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-bottom: 5px;}

.float_wkappnav .wanikani-app-nav-container {
    border-top: 1px solid rgb(240,240,240);}

.d-header header-dropdown-toggle.current-user.active .badge-notification,
.d-header .icons .badge-notification {
    top: 2px;
    right: 1px;}

.header-dropdown-toggle a:hover {
    background-color: rgba(42,42,42,0.2) !important;}

.drop-down-visible .d-header .icons .active .icon:after {
    border-top: 1px solid rgb(42,42,42);}

.drop-down-visible .d-header .icons .active .icon {
    background-color: rgba(42,42,42,0.3);}

.mfp-zoom-out-cur .d-header .wrap {
    overflow-x: visible !important;
    padding-right: 25px !important;}

.d-header .extra-info-wrapper .topic-link {
    padding-top: 2px;}

.avatar-flair[class*="paid"], .avatar-flair[class*="lifetime"], .avatar-flair[class*="admin"], .avatar-flair[class*="60"] {
    color: rgb(255,255,255);}

.d-header {
    border-top: 0;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(42,42,42);}

.menu-panel {
    border: 1px solid rgba(42,42,42,0.3);}

.header-dropdown-toggle a i,
.current-user a div {
    padding: 5px;}


/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~SEARCH~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/

.search-container .search {
    padding: 10px;}

.search-container .search .full-page-search {
    outline: none !important;}

.search-menu input[type='text'] {
    background-color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;
    box-shadow: none;}

.search-menu li:not(.category):not(.heading) a:hover {
    background-color: rgba(200,200,200,0.3) !important;}

.search-link .blurb {
    color: rgb(180,180,180);}

.user-table .user-preferences .control-group .select2-container,
.user-table .user-content .control-group .select2-container,
.cakeday .birthdays .cakeday-months .select2-container,
.cakeday .anniversaries .cakeday-months .select2-container,
.search-container .search-title .select2-container,
.search-container .search-title .select2-choice,
.search-container .search-title .select2-chosen,
.search-container .search-title .select2-chosen-1,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-choice,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-chosen-2,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-chosen,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .select2-container,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options .ac-wrap,
.search-container .search .search-advanced-options input {
    box-shadow: none;}

.search-container .search-title {
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(84,84,84);}

.search-container .fps-result {
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 0px;
    margin-top: 10px;}

.search-menu .panel-body-contents input,
.select2-drop .select2-search input,
#reply-control .category-input .select2-container a.select2-choice {
    color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);}

.select2-drop .select2-search {
    margin-top: 5px;}


/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~TOPIC LIST~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/

.topic-list {
    margin: 0 0 10px;}

.topic-list.topic-list-latest th {
    padding-left: 13px;}

.categories-and-latest .topic-list-latest {
    margin-left: 4.1%;}

.topic-list > tbody > tr:first-of-type {
    border-top: 3px solid rgb(84, 84, 84);}

.topic-list > tbody > tr {
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(84, 84, 84);}

.topic-list tr:last-child {
    border-bottom: 0;}

.topic-list .topic-list-item-separator td {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #C26FDC;}

.topic-list>tbody>tr.highlighted {
    animation-name: kumirei;}
    
.user-table .user-right .topic-list tr:first-child {
    border-top: 0;}

.user-table .user-right .topic-list tr:last-child {
    border-bottom: 0;}

.topic-list .topic-excerpt {
    display: none;}

.navigation-topics .list-container #list-area .topic-list-bottom {
    padding-left: 10px;}


/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~IN TOPIC~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/

.topic-map .link-summary .widget-button {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    border: solid 1px rgb(42,42,42);
    border-radius: 5px;}

.topic-map .link-summary .widget-button:hover {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.4);}

.timeline-container .topic-timeline .timeline-ago,
.timeline-container .topic-timeline .timeline-replies,
.timeline-container .topic-timeline .widget-link {
    color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px rgb(42,42,42);}

.timeline-container .timeline-scrollarea {
    border-left: 1px solid rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

@keyframes kumirei {
    from {background-color: rgba(194,111,220,0.3);}
    to {background-color: transparent;}}

.topic-body.highlighted {
    animation-name: kumirei;
/*    border-radius: 10px;
    padding-left: 71px;
    padding-right: 142px;
    margin-left: -60px;*/}

.quote .quote .quote {
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(42,42,42,0.1);
    border-top: 1px solid rgba(42,42,42,0.1);
    border-right: 1px solid rgba(42,42,42,0.1);
    background-color: rgba(194,111,220,0.1);}

.quote .quote .quote .quote .quote {
    background-color: rgba(127, 111, 220, 0.2);}

.quote .quote .quote .quote .quote .quote .quote{
    background-color: rgba(111, 181, 220, 0.2);}

.quote blockquote {
    margin-bottom: 0px;}

ins {
    background-color: rgba(194,111,220,0.3) !important;}

del {
    background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.3) !important;}

.onebox {
    border: 1px solid rgba(42,42,42,0.0) !important;
    background-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.2) !important;}

.highlight-strong {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.3);}

.topic-body .has-like {
    color: rgb(213,124,249) !important;}

.post-links-container .post-links {
    border-top: 1px solid rgb(200,200,200);}

#user-card {
    background-color: transparent !important;}

.topic-body .cooked .spoiled {
    color: transparent !important;
    padding: 0 5px 0 5px;
    text-shadow: none !important;}

.topic-body .cooked .spoiled p {
    color: transparent !important;}

.topic-body .cooked .spoiled p:hover {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.topic-body .cooked .spoiled[style~="0px;"] {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.topic-body .cooked .spoiled[style~="0px;"] p {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.topic-body .cooked .spoiled .mention {
    background: transparent !important;
    color: transparent !important;
    filter: blur(0px) !important;}

.topic-body .cooked .spoiled[style~="0px;"] .mention {
    background: rgb(240,240,240) !important;
    color: rgb(42,42,42) !important;
    filter: blur(0px) !important;}

.topic-body .cooked .spoiled:hover .mention {
    background: rgb(240,240,240) !important;
    color: rgb(42,42,42) !important;
    filter: blur(0px) !important;}

.topic-body .poll {
    border: 1px solid rgba(240,240,240,0.4);}

.topic-body .poll .poll-info {
    border-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.4);}

.topic-body .poll .poll-buttons {
    border-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.4);}

.moderator .topic-body {
    background-color: rgba(255,220,250,0.3);}

.topic-map section {
    border-color: rgb(42,42,42);}

.topic-map .buttons .btn {
    border-left: 1px solid rgb(42,42,42);
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(42,42,42);}

.action-list {
    width: 160px;}

.topic-map {
    border: 1px solid rgb(42,42,42) !important;}

.topic-post {
    padding-left: 15px;
    margin-top: 10px;
    width: 80%;}

.topic-meta-data .post-info.edits .heatmap-high {
    color: #f1ae7b !important;}

.post-controls .accepted,
.post-controls .accepted-text {
    color: rgb(187, 241, 165) !important;}

.timeline-container {
    border-top: none !important;}

.timeline-fullscreen .timeline-scrollarea {
    border-color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;
    border-left: none !important;}


/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~REPLY~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/


.d-editor-preview-header {
    display: none;}

#reply-control .wmd-controls .d-editor-input,
#reply-control .wmd-controls .d-editor-preview,
#reply-control .d-editor-button-bar {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0);}

#reply-control .wmd-controls .d-editor-preview {
    border-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.4);}

#reply-control .d-editor-button-bar {
    border-top: 1px solid;
    border-bottom: 1px solid;
    border-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.4);}

body .grippie:before {
    border-top: 3px double rgb(240,240,240)
;}

#reply-control.draft .row {
    padding-left: 5px;}

.d-editor-preview .spoiled {
    color: transparent !important;
    padding: 0 5px 0 5px;
    text-shadow: none !important;}

.d-editor-preview .spoiled[style~="0px;"] {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

#reply-control .contents .form-element .select2-container a {
    height: 26px;}

#reply-control.draft {
    padding-top: 1px;
    border-top: 0px;}

#reply-control .title-input input,
#reply-control .category-input .select2-container {
    color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important;
    box-shadow: none;
    margin-top: 2px !important;}

#create-topic.btn[disabled] {
    background-color: rgba(42,42,42,0.7) !important;}

.d-editor-button-bar button:hover,
.d-editor-button-bar button:active {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);}


/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~FOOTER~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/

#topic-footer-buttons p {
    display: none !important;}

#share-link input[type='text'] {
    background-color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;
    box-shadow: none;
    color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);}

.modal-inner-container,
.modal-inner-container .close,
.modal-inner-container .radio,
.modal-inner-container .modal-body label {
    background-color: rgb(255,255,255);}

.select-box-collection .select-box-row:hover,
.notification-options .dropdown-menu li a:hover {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2) !important;}

.pinned-options .dropdown-menu .disabled>a {
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(84,84,84);
    background: transparent !important;}


/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~USER PAGE~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/

.action-list .active {
    background-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.1) !important;}

.action-list li:hover {
    background-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.1) !important;
    color: rgb(42,42,24) !important;}

.user-table .child-actions,
.user-table .user-stream .item p {
    margin-left: 50px;}

.user-table .user-archive {
    margin-right: 10px;}

.user-table .no-content,
.user-table .user-stream,
.user-table .paginated-topics-list {
    margin-left: 00px;}

.user-table .user-stream .title {
    padding: 2px;
    width: 75%;}

.user-table .alert {
    padding-left: 0;}

.user-table .user-right {
    width: 766px;}

.user-table .user-right .item.notification p {
    margin-left: 10px !important;}

.user-table .user-preferences .control-group {
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;}

.user-table .top-section {
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-top: 10px;}

.user-table .user-stream .item {
    margin-bottom: 10px;}

.user-table .user-right .btn[title='Select messages'] {
    margin-left: 0px;}

.no-background .details .primary {
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-left: 10px;}

.user-table .top-section ul li,
.user-table .top-section .linked-stat a {
    padding: 0;
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 5px;
    padding-top: 5px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;}

.about .secondary {
    border-top: 1px solid rgba(240,240,240,0.2) !important;}

.user-table .top-section h3 {
    padding-left: 10px;}

.user-table .top-sub-section {
    margin-bottom: 10px;}

.user-table .top-sub-section p {
    padding: 0px;
    margin-bottom: 0px;}

.user-table .user-preferences {
    padding-left: 0px;
    padding-top: 0;}

.user-table .user-preferences .control-label {
    padding-left: 10px;}

.user-table .user-preferences .static {
    padding-left: 10px;}

.user-table .user-preferences .instructions {
    padding-left: 0px;}


.user-table .user-content .control-group:first-child {
    padding: 2px;}

.user-table .preferences-list {
    margin-right: 10px;}

.user-preferences .pref-username .instructions,
.user-preferences .pref-email .instructions {
    padding-left: 10px;}

.autocomplete a:hover,
.autocomplete a.selected {;
    background-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.1) !important;}

.preferences-list .indent {
    padding-left: 0 !important;}


/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~BADGES~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/

.list-controls .category-breadcrumb li.bullet>.badge-category {
    background-color: transparent !important;}

.badge-contents .badge-info-item h3 {
    padding-left: 0 !important;}

.topic-post-badges .badge-notification.unread {
    background: rgb(200,200,200);}

.user-table .badge-notification {
    background-color: rgb(200,200,200);}

.user-table .badges-section .badge-icon {
    border-right: 1px solid;
    border-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1);}

.user-table .user-badges-list .badge-card .badge-icon {
    background-color: rgb(230,230,230);
    border-right: 1px solid;
    border-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1);}

.badges-page .container.badges .title {
    padding: 5px;}

.badges-page .container.badges .title h3 {
    margin-bottom: 0px;}

.badges-page .container.badges .badge-card {
    margin-top: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 0px;}

.badge-card .badge-summary a {
    color: rgb(255,255,255);}

.badge-card .badge-icon {
    background-color: rgb(230,230,230);
    border-right: 1px solid;
    border-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1);}

.badges-page .container.badges {
    padding: 10px;}

.show-badge {
    padding: 10px;}

.show-badge .user-info {
    padding: 10px 0 0 10px;
    margin-right: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 5px;}



/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~CAKEDAY~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/

.cakeday .birthdays,
.cakeday .anniversaries {
    padding: 10px;}

.cakeday .title {
    display: none;}

.cakeday .birthdays .user-info,
.cakeday .anniversaries .user-info {
    padding: 10px 0 0 10px;
    margin-right: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 5px;}  

.user-table .user-preferences input,
.user-table .user-content .control-group .select2-container a,
.cakeday .birthdays .cakeday-months .select2-container a,
.cakeday .anniversaries .cakeday-months .select2-container a {
    background-color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;
    box-shadow: none;}

.cakeday .birthdays h3,
.cakeday .anniversaries h3 {
    padding: 2px;}

.cakeday .birthdays .cakeday-months .cakeday-header,
.cakeday .anniversaries .cakeday-months .cakeday-header {
    padding-right: 10px;}


/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ABOUT~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/

.about-page .about {
    padding: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;}

.about-page .about .user-info {
    margin-bottom: 0px;
    padding: 5px 0px 5px 5px;}

.about-page .about h2,
.about-page .about h3,
.about-page .about h4 {
    padding: 2px;
    margin-top: 0px;
    margin-bottom: 0px;}

.about-page .about.admins h3 {
    margin-bottom: 5px !important;}


/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~PAGE NOT FOUND~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/

.page-not-found,
.page-not-found-topics {
    padding: 10px;}


/*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~UNCATEGORISED~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~*/


div[itemprop="mainContentOfPage"] {
    padding: 1px 10px 10px 10px;}

.list-controls .btn .caret {
    border-top-color: rgb(200,200,200);}

.btn-primary[disabled], 
.btn-primary.disabled, 
.btn[disabled] {
    opacity: 0.7;}

.btn:focus {
    outline: none;}

.btn {
    outline: none;}

nav.post-controls button.like.d-hover {
    color: rgb(240,160,220) !important;}

.discourse-no-touch .topic-body .actions .fade-out {
    opacity: inherit;
    transition: inherit;}

.nav-pills>li.active>a, 
.nav-pills>li>a.active {
    background-color: rgba(42,42,42,0.7);}

.gap {
    margin-top: 10px;
    padding: 0 7.5px 0 7.5px;
    width: 80%;}

.category-list th {
    padding-left: 13px;}

.alert.alert-info {
    padding-top: 12px;
    padding-bottom: 12px;}

.top-lists .period-popup ul li:hover {
    background-color: rgba(240,240,240,0.2) !important;}

.select2-drop .select2-no-results {
    color: rgba(200,200,200,1);}

.static-tos div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'] h2,
.static-faq div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'] h2 {
    padding: 2px;
    padding-left: 4px;}

.static-privacy div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'],
.static-tos div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'],
.static-faq div[itemprop='mainContentOfPage'] {
    padding: 10px;}

.list-controls .category-breadcrumb li.bullet>.dropdown-header {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);
    background: rgb(42,42,42)}

.spinner {
    width: 55px;
    height: 55px;
    border: 2px solid rgb(240,240,240);
    border-top-color: transparent;
    border-bottom-color: transparent;
    background-image: url(https://i.imgur.com/z0eMoXs.png) !important;
    background-color: rgba(84,84,84,0.7) !important;
    background: no-repeat center 10px;
    background-size: 40px;
    animation: rotate-forever 1s infinite;}

.spinner.small {
    height: 15px;
    width: 15px;
    background-position: center center;
    background-size: 10px;}

.topic-notifications.topic-notifications .select-box-row .icons .selection-indicator {
    background-color: #C26FDC !important;}

.select-box-body {
    background: none !important;
    border: none !important;
    box-shadow: none !important;}

.select-box-body .d-icon {
    color: rgb(200,200,200);}

.topic-notifications.topic-notifications .select-box-body .texts .title {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.topic-notifications.topic-notifications .select-box-body .texts .desc {
    color: rgb(200,200,200);}

.topic-list-item .badge-wrapper.bullet span.badge-category {
    color: rgb(220,220,220) !important;}

.presence-users {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 10px;
    top: auto;
    background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0);
    right: 50%;
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.dropdown-select-box.dropdown-select-box .select-box-row.is-highlighted,
.select-box .select-box-row.is-selected.is-highlighted,
.select-box .select-box-row.is-highlighted,
.select-box .select-box-row.is-selected {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);}

.dropdown-select-box.dropdown-select-box .select-box-row .texts .desc,
.category-select-box.category-select-box .select-box-row .topic-count,
.category-select-box.category-select-box .select-box-row .category-desc {
    color: rgb(200,200,200);}

#topic-title .badge-wrapper.bullet span.badge-category {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

#topic-title .title-wrapper {
    border-radius: 5px;
    padding: 10px 0px 10px 10px;
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.35);}

.fancy-title {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.dropdown-select-box.dropdown-select-box .select-box-row .texts .title {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.dropdown-select-box.dropdown-select-box .select-box-row .texts .title {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.latest-topic-list-item.visited a.title:not(.badge-notification) {
    color: rgb(200,200,200);}

.latest-topic-list .bottom-row .badge-wrapper {
    padding: 2px 5px 0 5px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0);}

.categories-list .badge-wrapper.bullet span.badge-category {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.categories-list .category-name {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.category-list .subcategories .badge-wrapper.bullet span.badge-category {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.category-list .subcategories {
    border-radius: 5px;
    padding: 5px;
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.1);}

.topic-list-item.visited .link-top-line a {
    color: rgb(200,200,200) !important;}

.topic-list-item .fa.fa-lock {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.topic-body .cooked .spoiled[style~="5px;"] p image {
    filter: none !important;}

.composer-popup .close {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.quote .title {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.topic-featured-link {
    color: rgb(200,200,200) !important;}

.avatar-wrapper {
    background-color: transparent !important;}

.topic-body .reply-to-tab {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.names .fa {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.composer-popup {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7);}

.composer-popup a.widget-link {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.widget-link .badge-wrapper.bullet span.badge-category,
.widget-link .blurb {
    color: rgb(200,200,200) !important;}

.user-title {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.d-editor-preview-wrapper,
.d-editor-textarea-wrapper {
    background: transparent;}

#reply-control {
    border-top: none;}

.select-box-kit-collection {
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.7) !important;}

.select-box-kit .select-box-kit-body {
    background: transparent;}

.select-box-kit .select-box-kit-row.is-selected,
.select-box-kit .select-box-kit-row.is-highlighted,
.select-box-kit .select-box-kit-row.is-selected.is-highlighted {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);}

.select-box-kit .name {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.select-box-kit .desc {
    color: rgb(200,200,200) !important;}

.select-box-kit.dropdown-select-box .select-box-kit-body {
    border: none;}

.time-gap[style*="text-align: center"] {
    padding-left: 7.5px !important;
    width: 80% !important;
    max-width: none;}

.time-gap[style*="text-align: center"] img {
    margin-top: 10px;}

/* v.1.2.16. */

.user-menu .notifications .show-all .btn {
    border-radius: 0;
    color: rgb(240,240,240);
    background-color: transparent;}

.user-menu .notifications .show-all .btn:active {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5);}

.user-menu .notifications .show-all .btn:hover {
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7) !important;}

.d-editor-textarea-wrapper {
    border: 0;
    border-right: 1px solid rgba(240,240,240,0.4);}

#reply-control .reply-to {
    padding: 2px;
    padding-left: 5px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    background: rgba(240,240,240, 0.2);}

#reply-control .grippie {
    background: transparent;}

.d-header .title .logo-big {
    width: 398px !important;
	height: 60px !important;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	padding-left: 398px !important;
    background: url("https://i.imgur.com/te3wMyh.png") no-repeat;
	background-size: contain;
}

.topic-above-footer-buttons-outlet .presence-users {
    border-radius: 3px;
    padding: 5px;
    padding-right: 10px;
    margin-top: 10px;
    width: 80%;
    position: initial;
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.2);}

/* v.1.2.17. */

.fa-exclamation-circle.d-watching,
.fa-exclamation-circle.watching,
.fa-exclamation-circle.d-icon-d-watching,
.fa-circle.d-icon-d-tracking,
.fa-circle.d-tracking,
.fa-circle.tracking {
    color: rgb(194,111,220) !important;}

.select-box-kit .select-kit-body {
    border: 0 !important;
    background: transparent;}

/* v.1.2.19 */

.category-name {
    color: rgb(200,200,200);}

.dashboard_bubble {
    background-color: rgb(194, 111, 220) !important;}

/*support for rfindley's script's settings page*/
.wrap.not-found-container .settings {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);
    padding: 10px 0px 10px 10px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2);}

.wrap.not-found-container .settings > h1 {
    border-color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.wrap.not-found-container .settings .note {
    color: rgb(200,200,200);}

.wrap.not-found-container .settings #save {
    color: rgb(42,42,42) !important;}

.wrap.not-found-container .settings #save_status {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}
/*end rfindley's script's support*/

.d-header .title #site-logo:not(.logo-small) {
    width: 265px;
	height: 40px;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	padding-left: 265px;
    background: url("https://i.imgur.com/te3wMyh.png") no-repeat;
	background-size: contain;}

li[data-highlight="false"] .dashboard_bubble {
    color: rgb(42,42,42) !important;
    background-color: rgb(200,200,200) !important;}

.category-drop .category-drop-header {
    border-radius: 10px;
    background: rgb(42,42,42) !important;}

.category-drop .category-drop-header i,
.category-drop .category-drop-header .category-name {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.select-kit-collection {
    background: transparent !important;}

.select-kit-body {
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.7) !important;}

.category-drop .fa.fa-lock,
.select-kit-body .category-filter,
.select-kit-body .category-name {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.select-kit-body .is-highlighted,
.select-kit-body li:hover {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2) !important;}

.d-header-icons .icon:active {
    border-radius: 10px;
    background: rgba(42,42,42,0.2) !important;}

.select-kit .select-kit-row.is-selected {
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);}

.select-kit.dropdown-select-box .select-kit-body {
    border: 0;}

.select-kit.dropdown-select-box .select-kit-body .d-icon {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.select-kit.dropdown-select-box .select-kit-body .name {
    color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;}

.select-kit.dropdown-select-box .select-kit-body .desc {
    color: rgb(200,200,200) !important;}

.select-kit.dropdown-select-box.composer-actions .select-kit-header .d-icon {
    border: none;}

.embedded-posts,
.embedded-posts.top .row .topic-body,
.embedded-posts.top .row .topic-avatar {
    border: none;}

.embedded-posts .collapse-down, 
.embedded-posts .collapse-up {
    border: none;
    background: initial;}

.embedded-posts .collapse-down:hover, 
.embedded-posts .collapse-up:hover {
    background: rgba(42,42,42,0.2);}

/* v.1.2.20. */

.drop-down-mode .d-header-icons .active .icon {
    border: none;
    border-radius: 10px;
    background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2);}

.drop-down-mode .d-header-icons .active .icon:after {
    border-color: rgb(42,42,42);}

/* v.1.2.21. */

.d-header-icons .icon:hover, .d-header-icons .icon:focus {
    background-color: rgba(42,42,42,0.2) !important;}

.search-advanced {
    background-color: rgba(42,42,42,0.2);
    padding: 10px;
    border-radius: 10px;}

.search-advanced input {
    background-color: #fff !important;}

.search-advanced .search-info,
.search-advanced .search-title {
    color: rgb(240,240,240);
    border-bottom-color: rgb(240,240,240) !important;
    background: transparent;}

.search-advanced .select-kit {
    color: rgb(42,42,42);}

.search-advanced-sidebar .search-advanced-title {
    background-color: rgba(42,42,42,0.2) !important;
    border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0;
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.search-advanced-sidebar .search-advanced-filters {
    background-color: rgba(42,42,42,0.2) !important;
    border-radius: 0 0 10px 10px;
    color: rgb(240,240,240);}

.selected-name,
.date-picker,
.search-advanced-sidebar .select-kit-header {
    color: rgb(42,42,42) !important;}
}
